features: The Best Kitchen Knife Set : This 6 Knife set Includes 8 inch Chef Knife, 8 inch Slicing Knife, 8 inch Bread Knife, 7 inch Santoku Knife, 5 inch Tomato Knife, 3.5 inch Paring knife. Each Color Coded Knife comes with a Blade Guard. Non Stick, Stainless Steel, Dishwasher Safe. Tough Impact Resistant Handles.

Dishwasher Safe : ColorSlice knives are dishwasher safe, simplifying the cleaning process after a busy cooking session. Say goodbye to time-consuming hand washing – these knives are built to withstand the rigors of the dishwasher without compromising their quality.

Knife Set with Blade Guards: Each knife comes with a protective cover, ensuring safety during storage and preventing accidental nicks or damage to the blades. Easily store them in your drawer, on a magnetic strip or on the counter.
Color Coded: Color-Coding helps with quick knife identification and is a smart solution for safe and organized food preparation. It also adds a pop of color to your kitchen.

Lifetime Guarantee: Your satisfaction is our top priority. All Gourmet Forged knives come with a 100% Satisfaction Guarantee. Contact us any time even if the knife is out of the return window and we will replace or refund your purchase. We respond to any questions within 12 hours. You can buy with confidence.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: A Burst of Vibrant Colors: Elevate your kitchen aesthetics with the ColorSlice 6-piece knife set, showcasing a rainbow spectrum of bright and lively colors that add a delightful pop to your countertop.Express your culinary creativity through the palette of colors that reflect the vibrant joy of cooking. .

Precision and Durability: Crafted from high carbon steel, ColorSlice knives offer exceptional cutting precision and edge retention, ensuring clean and accurate cuts every time.The anti-rust coating enhances the longevity of the blades, making these knives a reliable and durable addition to your kitchen arsenal. .

Effortless Maintenance: Designed with convenience in mind, ColorSlice knives are dishwasher safe, simplifying the cleaning process after a busy cooking session.Say goodbye to time-consuming hand washing – these knives are built to withstand the rigors of the dishwasher without compromising their quality. .

Complete Set with Blade Guards: The ColorSlice 6-piece knife set includes a versatile range of knives to tackle various cutting tasks, from slicing to dicing and more.Each knife comes with a protective cover, ensuring safety during storage and preventing accidental nicks or damage to the blades. .

Style Meets Functionality: Experience the fusion of style and functionality with the ColorSlice knife set – a balance between striking aesthetics and high-performance kitchen tools.Ideal for both seasoned chefs and cooking enthusiasts, this set brings a touch of color and excitement to your culinary journey. Invest in the ColorSlice 6-piece knife set today and transform your cooking experience with the perfect blend of colorful flair, exceptional performance, and practicality. Discover the joy of preparing meals with knives that stand out in both style and substance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Splash of color and Safety all in One!!
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE these knives. I love that they are sharp and color coded and most importantly have a safety sheath. I love the splash of color it gives my countertop in the ceramic container I have. Bright and cheery plus safe! A total win!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars MORE THAN I HOPED FOR!
reviews.reviewText: I figured, for the price, it was worth getting a set as my cheap knives were falling apart. This set is way more than I expected. They look great, add a dash of fun color to my kitchen, but more importantly they are SHARP! I mean razor sharp, and with the sheaths they come with, they'll stay that way in the drawer. When it comes to value, I couldn't be more pleased. Less than $5 a blade? Highly recommend!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Everyday kitchen knives
reviews.reviewText: I'm a big fan of these knives. With the included blade guards, they can go into a drawer really easily and not risk cutting your hand off when you rummage around for them. And with that in mind, they are very very sharp, which is great. And like my more expensive block-based knives, a simple strop is all it takes to get them back to razor sharp. They take and hold an edge pretty well, and give us plenty of knives to use on those days where we seem to need them all. Perfect set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars colorful but could be sharper
reviews.reviewText: My Mother asked me for a ceramic paring knife because hers was chipped. Instead, I got her these, mainly because they were colorful, and a full set instead of just a single knife. Here is her honest opinion:"After trying these knives on various items, such as a tomato and onion, I found they work very well. I believe these can be sharpened if they get dull which you cannot do with a ceramic knife.I will use these for many applications."She really likes her ceramic knives, and I understand why, but the fact that they can chip so easily is a big bummer. It's not great to know these aren't as sharp as she'd like, but like she said; maybe they can be sharpened?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The colors of these knives are just as vibrant in person as they are in pictures. I’m really impressed with the sharpness. You could just about shave with these (honestly, I tested one when I opened the box out of curiosity and it cut the hair on my arm). It slices through meat like chicken breast easier than any other knife I have. I definitely recommend this if you want a colorful and functional set of knives.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I loved these so much that I bought my daughter and daughter in law a set for Christmas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality for the Price!
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for my daughter in college to try a set of inexpensive knives that she could use in her everyday cooking. They didn't disappoint! They came super sharp and well made. She loves the fact that they can go into the dishwasher and have the protective sheaths. These are now her new go to knives in the kitchen!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun and super sharp
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these knives as a gift and ended up keeping them for myself and ordering another set for my friend. They’re fun to work with, hold an edge, and sharpen well. And they look super cute on my knife rack!
